SEARCH
Package gw.api.print

Class PrintUserGroupTreeViewAction

java.lang.Object
gw.api.print.PrintAction
gw.api.print.AbstractCCPrintAction
gw.api.print.CustomPrintAction
gw.api.print.AbstractOrganizationTreeViewPrintAction
gw.api.print.PrintUserGroupTreeViewAction
public final class PrintUserGroupTreeViewAction extends AbstractOrganizationTreeViewPrintAction
Action which handles device output of the User/Group tree view. What is unique about the user group tree that makes it a special variant of the standard PrintWidgetAction is that is triggered from a menu action, so there is no location to "go" to -- it is a custom print action which does not use the widget printing infrastructure which directly generates output based on the backing data.
Author:
pyoung
